issue.title: Robots not working with new docker images

content.raw:
Hi Nate, sorry for the delay responding. I should have mentioned the errors are in the robot logs. The main simulation server logs look fine. 

The paths are in `simpletesturban-a71032a3-5aca-452e-b2a0-aaae898ca272-X2N1.tar` : `/log/c3ad112e-7886-11ea-9ccd-e2d419ed4dfb/rosout.log`\(at the end\) and `/log/rostopic_247_1586233084153.log`.
content.html:
Hi Nate, sorry for the delay responding. I should have mentioned the errors are in the robot logs. The main simulation server logs look fine.

The paths are in simpletesturban-a71032a3-5aca-452e-b2a0-aaae898ca272-X2N1.tar : /log/c3ad112e-7886-11ea-9ccd-e2d419ed4dfb/rosout.log(at the end) and /log/rostopic_247_1586233084153.log.
